title: Home Care Equipment | Atrium Health
description: Atrium Health At Home takes care of you in the comfort of your own home and also offers the right home medical equipment.
cleaned_text: As your needs change, so does our care. Atrium Health At Home offers a wide-range of home care services to meet your needs or your loved ones needs. Our team of experts provides compassionate, high-quality care in the comfort of home. Our home care services include: Atrium Health At Home provides quality, home health services for patients of all ages throughout the region. As part of Atrium Health, we are backed by more experience, greater access and more services than any homecare provider in our region. Through regular visits to your home, a nurse or therapist will provide care, education and monitoring. Our team includes: Home health services offered through Atrium Health At Home: Atrium Health At Home provides home oxygen therapy services to help you or a loved one with respiratory conditions, such as severe lung disease, sleep apnea or other breathing disorders. Home respiratory services include: [Find a medical equipment & sleep disorder equipment (CPAP) location near you.](#healthy-at-home-locations) When receiving infusion therapy, medicine is given through a needle or catheter. Receiving infusion and therapy at home is an excellent alternative to an extended stay at a hospital or nursing home. Also, home treatment is often less expensive, can improve quality of life and delivers better outcomes. Our team of highly experienced and clinically trained pharmacists, infusion nurses and registered dietitians provide exceptional care in the comfort of home. Some of the home infusion therapies we administer and monitor include: Physician Referrals to Home Healthcare If you need to refer a patient for home care, Atrium Health At Home is happy to help. We have a centralized referral intake system where clients are given a single contact at the time of referral. Registered nurses are available to assist you by: Contact our home care specialists to make a referral for home healthcare 704-512-5550. We know how valuable it is to receive care in the comfort of home, which is why we come to you. With locations across 13 counties in the Charlotte region, our team of experts conveniently provide home care when you need it.
